--- title: Core keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "This is the core notebook." ---

Functions¶

This part shows how functions look like

say_hi[source]

say_hi(to)

Say hi to someone

say_hi("Sergi")

hi Sergi

test_eq(say_hi("Guillem"),"Hi Guillem")

assert say_hi("Joana") == "Hi Joana"

Classes¶

Same but with classes

class hiSayer:
    "Dumb class that spams hi to someone"
    def __init__(self,to):
        self.to = to
        
    def say(self):
        "Calls function `say_hi` to say hi"
        return say_hi(self.to)

class hiSayer[source]

hiSayer(to)

Dumb class that spams hi to someone

hiSayer.say[source]

hiSayer.say()

Calls function say_hi to say hi

hiSayer says hi to whoever we want with the method say

sayer = hiSayer("Alex")
sayer.say()

'Hi Alex'
